short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will generate a modified qr code from the pureauth page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The RUQO extension is a part of the PureAUTH Authentication suite. This element of the authentication suite allows users to authenticate smoothly without invoking the desktop app.

By installing this extension, you can access restricted applications through the mobile authenticator app by scanning the QR generated by the extension on the PureAUTH authentication page.

This extension also only generates QR codes on trusted PureAUTH page, eliminating phishing attacks. The challenge QR generated, also has the zero trust controls which allow access to SAAS based applications only from a trusted corporate device.
